description: King's Bounty II is an upcoming turn-based tactical role-playing game developed by 1C Entertainment and published by Prime Matter that will be released for Nintendo Switch, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on August 24, 2021. It is a direct sequel to the first King's Bounty game released in 1990, though a spin off title, King's Bounty: The Legend, that was also developed by 1C was released in 2008. King's Bounty II was initially announced for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on August 14, 2019. The Nintendo Switch version was announced on March 26, 2020 in a Nintendo Direct Mini presentation.
title: King's Bounty II
